item.title: Leetcode-56. Merge Intervals
item.description: Given an array of intervals where intervals[i] = [starti, endi], merge all overlapping intervals, and return an array of the non-overlapping intervals that cover all the intervals in the input.

item.description: You are given an array of non-overlapping intervals intervals where intervals[i] = [starti, endi] represent the start and the end of the ith interval and intervals is sorted in ascending order by starti.

item.title: Leetcode-169. Majority Element
item.description: Given an array nums of size n, return the majority element.

item.title: Leetcode-53. Maximum Subarray
item.description: Given an integer array nums, find the subarray with the largest sum, and return its sum.

item.title: Leetcode-349. Intersection of Two Arrays
item.description: Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return an array of their intersection.

item.title: Leetcode-347. Top K Frequent Elements
item.description: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements.

item.title: Leetcode-394. Decode String
item.description: Given an encoded string, return its decoded string. The encoding rule is: k[encoded_string], where the encoded_string inside the square brackets is being repeated exactly k times.

item.title: Leetcode-567. Permutation in String
item.description: Given two strings s1 and s2, return true if s2 contains a permutation of s1, or false otherwise.

item.title: Leetcode-3. Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
item.description: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

item.description: Given the root of a complete binary tree, return the number of the nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-916. Word Subsets
item.description: You are given two string arrays words1 and words2. A string b is a subset of string a if every letter in b occurs in a including multiplicity.

item.title: Leetcode-67. Add Binary
item.description: Given two binary strings a and b, return their sum as a binary string.
